net.nexttext.renderer
Class P3DTextPageRenderer

java.lang.Object
  net.nexttext.renderer.TextPageRenderer
      net.nexttext.renderer.G3DTextPageRenderer
          net.nexttext.renderer.P3DTextPageRenderer

public class P3DTextPageRenderer
extends G3DTextPageRenderer

Renders the text stored in a text page.

This TextPage renderer is based on the Java2D API.
